CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 16, 1966, pg. 1B reads: "More Visitors - These were also among the out-of-town guests attending The Squaws' dinner-dance at the Holiday House. Seated, left to right Mrs. John Ross, Warren, Ohio; Audrey Quinn, Philadelphia; Melva Martin, St. Albans, N.Y.; Maxine Bandy, Washington, D.C., and Mrs. John Bordon, Cranford, N.J.  Standing from left: J.F. Martin, St. Albans, N.Y.; John Ross, Warren, Ohio; Robert Jones, Philadelphia; Lucille Bogotta [sic], Columbia, South America; Mr. and Mrs. Robert Arnold Jr.,  Detroit, Mich.; Mr. and Mrs. James Patterson, Buffalo, N.J.; Harold White, Hollidaysburg, Pa., and John Borden, Cranford, N.J."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, seated: Mrs. John Ross, Audrey Quinn, Melva Martin, Maxine Bandy, and Mrs. John Bordon;  standing includes: J.F. Martin, John Ross, Robert Jones, Lucille Bogotta, Mr. and Mrs. Robert Arnold Jr., Mr. and Mrs. James Patterson, Harold White, and John Borden, posed in the Holiday House for the Squaws "Cotton Extravaganza" Dinner-Dance, Monroeville
